div.bibl: The Sentinel, Volumes 5-6; Week of May 3, 1912. Page 19.

body.p: One of the pioneer Jews in Chicago, Solomon Feldstein, is dead at the age of sixty nine. He came to Chicago from Russia forty two years ago. His was one of the first twenty orthodox Jewish families in the city, and not long after his arrival, he organized Congregation Anshe Keneseth Israel and became its first president. This congregation is today the largest west of New York.
